title: Liverpool's Last-Gasp Lifesaver
description:
The FC crew react to Liverpool's late win against Newcastle and question whether this emotional result can kick-start the rest of the their league campaign. Plus, Erling Haaland secures his second-consecutive hat trick in as many games, Arsenal continue to prove their doubters wrong and Tottenham look limp against West Ham.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Liverpool's last-gasp win; Haaland running rampant in the Premier League; Arsenal proving doubters wrong
